name: opensourcepos
description: Open Source Point of Sale is a web-based point of sale system written in the PHP language. It uses MySQL as the data storage back-end and has a simple user interface.

scripts.copy: grunt clean:ui & grunt clean:licenses & grunt copy & npm run gen-licenses
scripts.full: npm run reset & npm run copy & npm run prettier
scripts.gen-licenses: npm ls --prod --json > public/license/npm-prod.licenses & npm ls --dev --json > public/license/npm-dev.licenses & composer licenses --format=json > public/license/composer.licenses
scripts.reset: npm run clean & npm install & npm run install & npm run update
scripts.update: npm update & composer self-update & composer update
